# load(ordering:)

**Instance Method**

Atomically loads and returns the current value, applying the specified memory ordering.

## Declaration

```swift
func load(ordering: AtomicLoadOrdering) -> Value
```

## Parameters

- **ordering**: The memory ordering to apply on this operation.

## Return Value

The current value.
title: load(ordering:)
